name: Space Drop
description: Planets and Objects fall from space. Match in 3, 4 or 5's. It sounds easy, but becomes increasingly difficult as the player progresses with the addition of more Planets/Objects.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7,8,10 Processor: Intel i3 or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel Graphics 4600 or better Storage: 25 MB available space Additional Notes: Screen 1024 x 768
